channel.title: Question!
channel.description:
Ok, I guess I got that Problem Fixed, But Another Question!
You know the thing where you can hide your script?
Like this?
[scar]GetSelf.Hide;[/scar]
Well, I was wondering, And someone told me you can get banned from it , but I just wanted to make sure...
[b]Can you get banned from hiding SCAR anyways?[/b]

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Wow, thats pretty cool then =), thanks Kane

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Sebo, post:1, topic:16949”]Ok, I guess I got that Problem Fixed, But Another Question!

You know the thing where you can hide your script?

Like this?

[scar]GetSelf.Hide;[/scar]

Well, I was wondering, And someone told me you can get banned from it , but
I just wanted to make sure…

Can you get banned from hiding SCAR anyways?[/quote]
No, you can’t. You can’t get banned either for changing the title of Scar, as Jagex cannot read your tasks; That would be an invasion of privacy.

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:

I have np clue lol, it is supposed to stop once it finds the bitmap ‘Existing User’ lol

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Ya I just tried it out and it did move it random spots, and wouldn’t stop! Lol, I had to log out to shut if off because it hid itself. But not that big of a problem. So what was causing the random mouse movements?

Read full topic

thanks for helping but i figured out the prob =), thanks anyways

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

[code]{++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++ ++++++++++++++]
[ Sebo’s RuneScape Window Opener/Loginer ]
[ Made by: Sebo! ]
[ Credits- Weibs, And all the people who help me on Mopar. ]
[ Setup Lines/Username/Password Setup on - 41-42 ]
[ Enjoi, my script ]
[ Other: I spent over 6 weeks perfecting this script. ]
[ And I acctually might start using SRL, Once i Furgure out how to. ]
[ 240+ Lines of Script!!! ]
[++++++++++++++ ++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++}

Program RuneScape_Opener;

{-----------------------------------]
| Comment me On Mopar, Username = |
| Sebo (Well Duhhh.) |
[-----------------------------------}

{ |—|
|—|
|—|
-----------
---------/
-------/
-----/
—/
-/
-
Go Down For Setup! }

Var
User,Tool,Play,x,y:Integer;

//////////////////////////////////////////////
Const/////////////////////////Setup///////////
UserName = ‘UserName Here’; //Username HERE //
PassWord = ‘PassWord Here’; //Password HERE //
//////////////////////////////////////////////

//--------------------------------------------------------------|
{ Dont Touch Anymore if Your A LEECHER. *
| |
|---------------------------------------------------------------}

Procedure IE_Finder;
Begin
Tool := BitmapFromString(13, 8, ‘2139713A5F8E70A8C893DBEF9C’ +
‘EDFE98F0FE8AF1FE78EDFE69EBFD5CDEFB4DD2FA4CD2FB4CC4F06’ +
‘AA1C2A3EBFAB0FEFFA6FDFF92F0FE83EFFD75F6FD6BF3FC60E8FB’ +
‘4ED7F940C8F73BC2F63BC1F5B3FEFFB5FFFF98F3FE83DDFA5FB0D’ +
‘168B4D168F0FB59E3F94AD3F73BC4F632B8F22EB3EF30B0EFAEFE’ +
‘FF89E4FD69BCDF4370A15E90B568DBF358DDF748D1F73BC2F432B’ +
‘7F02DB0ED2BABEC2BA9EB81DAF75BABCF26417A4C7EA964D6F151’ +
‘D6F53DBBEC30A7E12A9DDC279FDF2BA6E82BA8EA2BA4E94B8DB72’ +
‘23B734182AB5AD5F14CD1F435A8DF237FB51E689B1C63931F76B0’ +
‘2494D72A9FE4299EE62138703F8BB35CD4F24ED6F736ABE11F639’ +
‘51936621A305F1934631838661A487B2388CC299BE53985AE55D2’ +
‘F151D6F73EBFF02374A8162A531D356B1E346E1C356E1C356E1C3’ +
‘66D1C528B2995DE’);
If(Findbitmap(Tool,x,y))Then
Begin
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x,y,15,15,14,58,12);
Wait(150+Random(150));
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(43);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(4000);
End;
End;

Procedure BoredMouse;
Begin
Repeat
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500),15,15,35,50,15);
Wait(500+Random(500));
Until(Findcolor(x,y,14258485,5,22,971,253));
End;

Procedure IE_Tool;
Begin
If(FindColor(x,y,14258485,5,22,971,253))Then
Begin
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,14,16,58,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(6000)
End;
End;

Procedure RuneScape;
Begin
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(175)
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(141)
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(165)
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(61)
SendKeys(‘R’);
Wait(74)
SendKeys(‘u’);
Wait(127)
SendKeys(‘ne’);
Wait(61)
SendKeys(‘Sc’);
Wait(45)
SendKeys(‘a’);
Wait(116)
SendKeys(‘p’);
Wait(215)
SendKeys(‘e’);
Wait(143)
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(111)
SendKeys(‘co’);
Wait(122)
SendKeys(‘m’+chr(13));
Wait(111)
Wait(3421)
End;

Procedure FindThatGame;
Begin
Play := BitmapFromString(13, 17, ‘z78DAA5935B8E85400844B724’ +
‘D0CFCF7E78F7BFA461284CDA8C1A73E7A74C040F50204F2EBC4DE’ +
‘A398F37DAF75672A8B5C4D84390C64D84076FABBEA7AD3AA4F51C’ +
‘9439859CB671FA9606459FCF349FA20B7390C2BB3EAC8752728A7’ +
‘4EAB0B44F4ECF930692C475A53DE7AF3917D19573F4A6DD56CA33’ +
‘A6DBDE2CF35FBE6DCA9F5ABB91EB779C5E1BA71D53B05D9AF6366’ +
‘97F750FA34BAE20949E9BEE119CC1913A549210D73B57E1D549D7’ +
‘EDD83D382D3151955D2AA70B9AB9FA86F6AB34BC377B7FD99B3AA’ +
‘0B50A8F5B1A360EA6F98FE8052D691623EABA49E4E41CA8B9E475’ +
‘E14C95C9179E6BACEAC6EDAB1373259B1BFCE17C68E06BDFDC07D’ +
‘C249856D7FFB8A1B486E94E3BC57BE4A3A2CDE83956D1A7F83B2F’ +
‘7AB329FCDE6CA7C8591D46D433C13C578463BE8563A73F315724A’ +
‘D’);
//Bitmap Test!//
If(FindBitmap(Play, x,y))Then
Begin
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x+3,y+4,14,21,15,15,2);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(150);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(2500);
If(FindColorTolerance(x,y,66104,556,331,783,449,10))Then
Begin
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(1500);
FindColor(x,y,2109487,340,246,578,384);
Wait(500);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(4000);
End;
End;
Repeat //
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500),15,15,35,50,15);
Wait(500+Random(500));
Until(FindBitmap(User,x,y));
Sleep(35000);
User := BitmapFromString(53, 15, ‘z78DAA558498EC3300CFB5250’ +
‘2B69E798629AFF3FA940ED03039A329DE4201482AC855A6C351E1’ +
‘1F18957EC6BC47F1CEBBE6EEB732B482B5FD27A1669D5F9A3E553’ +
‘8EF8ABB4237987B27E8CE592B6A6732FEF88B295572C8D560E586’ +
‘9BF734C40E7846F28C91A887610608BB99EDC1F9565958B8A1552’ +
‘F0F0E42D2076189F15BBC8A985863A7BA98A3A7E12268E8C9254E’ +
‘82DE9977B38516F22B3AA664E79747A50A1811CD1A11DAF389614’ +
‘BD7CCE7432C8511BDDEA63DEF150546CAEB3D945DC6C1F2EA267C’ +
‘F319657BDEFC4883A07E891ADCE04CB699A4DD5EF6CB713EFCFC3’ +
‘7A5675D0894F77D0A9F7813F98B402997C1AA3AD1A756EA521F32’ +
‘8A5BCEBEFDC629311B1F3ACE3378CD2CC1352E56276D2E6F29DDA’ +
‘8369A6FC74E4D10AF2151ADCB9EA05A8AC6085E79AFD8A623D3C3’ +
‘F55773B68E4F2155BD55F72AA40B538B5C7F782440FACAB88F2EE’ +
‘F06F96FB7CAE49DC2F648CE09BDFB988E1003DBA9B94BC73AF4D9’ +
‘CBD8DAA422FAF2BA70BD4B4579E0CE667DAE97790CFEB798006ED’ +
‘688BF1F1BD26EF3BE85F872F5FE6B4792949D689671D3EBF64648’ +
‘538BBBFF3CF8092375E77D6AE37BB9D5D7BA98A3D4855E3C0A2C2’ +
‘2DC77C722BE777FB20838A73630BCE6F1F35C3BF9F2B3A22’);
If(FindBitmap(User,x,y))Then
Begin
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(1500);
SendKeys(UserName+chr(13));
Wait(257);
SendKeys(PassWord);
Wait(650);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
HoldMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(8); //Realistic Human Mouse Click
ReleaseMouse(x,y, True); //Kinda like antiBan =)
Wait(3458);
End;
End;

{--------------------------------------------------------]
[The Script Will Hide itself to make it look like it’s a ]
[Human or a GHOST! Oooohhh, Spooky! ]
[--------------------------------------------------------}
Procedure credits;
begin
Writeln(’##########################################################’)
WriteLn(’# Thanks for using Sebos… #’)
WriteLn(’# RuneScape Window Opener! #’)
WriteLn(’#Another thanks to MJordan for the credits =) #’)
WriteLn(’#For the person / People, who made the F1 Thing #’)
WriteLn(’#And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR! #’)
WriteLn(’##########################################################’)
end;

{-----------------}
{| Main Script |}
{-----------------}
///////////////////
//-DONT TOUCH----//
///////////////////

Begin
GetSelf.Hide;
ActivateClient;
WriteLn(‘Enjoi My script, Thanks.’);
IE_Finder;
BoredMouse;
IE_Tool;
RuneScape;
FindThatGame;
WriteLn(’////////////////’);
WriteLn(’//-GO SEBO!—//’);
WriteLn(’////////////////’);
Credits;
GetSelf.Show;
{—Oh Yeah!—}
End.[/code]

Try that, after your if statements you need to put a begin if you have multiple lines afterwards, and then an end after that.

Hope it works,

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo

Yeah, I get a probelm finding bitmap when I play it… it just uses random mose all thew time and it is not finding the bimap, Could anyone Fix that?

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[scar]{++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++ ++++++++++++++]
[ Sebo’s RuneScape Window Opener/Loginer ]
[ Made by: Sebo! ]
[ Credits- Weibs, And all the people who help me on Mopar. ]
[ Setup Lines/Username/Password Setup on - 41-42 ]
[ Enjoi, my script ]
[ Other: I spent over 6 weeks perfecting this script. ]
[ And I acctually might start using SRL, Once i Furgure out how to. ]
[ 240+ Lines of Script!!! ]
[++++++++++++++ ++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++}

Program RuneScape_Opener;

{-----------------------------------]
| Comment me On Mopar, Username = |
| Sebo (Well Duhhh.) |
[-----------------------------------}

{ |—|
|—|
|—|
-----------
---------/
-------/
-----/
—/
-/
-
Go Down For Setup! }

Var
User,Tool,Play,x,y:Integer;

//////////////////////////////////////////////
Const/////////////////////////Setup///////////
UserName = ‘UserName Here’; //Username HERE //
PassWord = ‘PassWord Here’; //Password HERE //
//////////////////////////////////////////////

//--------------------------------------------------------------|
{ Dont Touch Anymore if Your A LEECHER. *
| |
|---------------------------------------------------------------}

Procedure IE_Finder;
Begin
Tool := BitmapFromString(13, 8, ‘2139713A5F8E70A8C893DBEF9C’ +
‘EDFE98F0FE8AF1FE78EDFE69EBFD5CDEFB4DD2FA4CD2FB4CC4F06’ +
‘AA1C2A3EBFAB0FEFFA6FDFF92F0FE83EFFD75F6FD6BF3FC60E8FB’ +
‘4ED7F940C8F73BC2F63BC1F5B3FEFFB5FFFF98F3FE83DDFA5FB0D’ +
‘168B4D168F0FB59E3F94AD3F73BC4F632B8F22EB3EF30B0EFAEFE’ +
‘FF89E4FD69BCDF4370A15E90B568DBF358DDF748D1F73BC2F432B’ +
‘7F02DB0ED2BABEC2BA9EB81DAF75BABCF26417A4C7EA964D6F151’ +
‘D6F53DBBEC30A7E12A9DDC279FDF2BA6E82BA8EA2BA4E94B8DB72’ +
‘23B734182AB5AD5F14CD1F435A8DF237FB51E689B1C63931F76B0’ +
‘2494D72A9FE4299EE62138703F8BB35CD4F24ED6F736ABE11F639’ +
‘51936621A305F1934631838661A487B2388CC299BE53985AE55D2’ +
‘F151D6F73EBFF02374A8162A531D356B1E346E1C356E1C356E1C3’ +
‘66D1C528B2995DE’);
If(Findbitmap(Tool,x,y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x,y,15,15,14,58,12);
Wait(150+Random(150));
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(43);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(4000);
End;

Procedure BoredMouse;
Begin
Repeat
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500),15,15,35,50,15);
Wait(500+Random(500));
Until(Findcolor(x,y,14258485,5,22,971,253));
End;

Procedure IE_Tool;
Begin
If(FindColor(x,y,14258485,5,22,971,253))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,14,16,58,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(6000)
End;

Procedure RuneScape;
Begin
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(175)
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(141)
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(165)
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(61)
SendKeys(‘R’);
Wait(74)
SendKeys(‘u’);
Wait(127)
SendKeys(‘ne’);
Wait(61)
SendKeys(‘Sc’);
Wait(45)
SendKeys(‘a’);
Wait(116)
SendKeys(‘p’);
Wait(215)
SendKeys(‘e’);
Wait(143)
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(111)
SendKeys(‘co’);
Wait(122)
SendKeys(‘m’+chr(13));
Wait(111)
Wait(3421)
End;

Procedure FindThatGame;
Begin
Play := BitmapFromString(13, 17, ‘z78DAA5935B8E85400844B724’ +
‘D0CFCF7E78F7BFA461284CDA8C1A73E7A74C040F50204F2EBC4DE’ +
‘A398F37DAF75672A8B5C4D84390C64D84076FABBEA7AD3AA4F51C’ +
‘9439859CB671FA9606459FCF349FA20B7390C2BB3EAC8752728A7’ +
‘4EAB0B44F4ECF930692C475A53DE7AF3917D19573F4A6DD56CA33’ +
‘A6DBDE2CF35FBE6DCA9F5ABB91EB779C5E1BA71D53B05D9AF6366’ +
‘97F750FA34BAE20949E9BEE119CC1913A549210D73B57E1D549D7’ +
‘EDD83D382D3151955D2AA70B9AB9FA86F6AB34BC377B7FD99B3AA’ +
‘0B50A8F5B1A360EA6F98FE8052D691623EABA49E4E41CA8B9E475’ +
‘E14C95C9179E6BACEAC6EDAB1373259B1BFCE17C68E06BDFDC07D’ +
‘C249856D7FFB8A1B486E94E3BC57BE4A3A2CDE83956D1A7F83B2F’ +
‘7AB329FCDE6CA7C8591D46D433C13C578463BE8563A73F315724A’ +
‘D’);
//Bitmap Test!//
If(FindBitmap(Play, x,y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x+3,y+4,14,21,15,15,2);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(150);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(2500);
If(FindColorTolerance(x,y,66104,556,331,783,449,10))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(1500);
FindColor(x,y,2109487,340,246,578,384);
Wait(500);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(4000);
Repeat //
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500),15,15,35,50,15);
Wait(500+Random(500));
Until(FindBitmap(User,x,y));
Sleep(35000);
User := BitmapFromString(53, 15, ‘z78DAA558498EC3300CFB5250’ +
‘2B69E798629AFF3FA940ED03039A329DE4201482AC855A6C351E1’ +
‘1F18957EC6BC47F1CEBBE6EEB732B482B5FD27A1669D5F9A3E553’ +
‘8EF8ABB4237987B27E8CE592B6A6732FEF88B295572C8D560E586’ +
‘9BF734C40E7846F28C91A887610608BB99EDC1F9565958B8A1552’ +
‘F0F0E42D2076189F15BBC8A985863A7BA98A3A7E12268E8C9254E’ +
‘82DE9977B38516F22B3AA664E79747A50A1811CD1A11DAF389614’ +
‘BD7CCE7432C8511BDDEA63DEF150546CAEB3D945DC6C1F2EA267C’ +
‘F319657BDEFC4883A07E891ADCE04CB699A4DD5EF6CB713EFCFC3’ +
‘7A5675D0894F77D0A9F7813F98B402997C1AA3AD1A756EA521F32’ +
‘8A5BCEBEFDC629311B1F3ACE3378CD2CC1352E56276D2E6F29DDA’ +
‘8369A6FC74E4D10AF2151ADCB9EA05A8AC6085E79AFD8A623D3C3’ +
‘F55773B68E4F2155BD55F72AA40B538B5C7F782440FACAB88F2EE’ +
‘F06F96FB7CAE49DC2F648CE09BDFB988E1003DBA9B94BC73AF4D9’ +
‘CBD8DAA422FAF2BA70BD4B4579E0CE667DAE97790CFEB798006ED’ +
‘688BF1F1BD26EF3BE85F872F5FE6B4792949D689671D3EBF64648’ +
‘538BBBFF3CF8092375E77D6AE37BB9D5D7BA98A3D4855E3C0A2C2’ +
‘2DC77C722BE777FB20838A73630BCE6F1F35C3BF9F2B3A22’);
If(FindBitmap(User,x,y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(1500);
SendKeys(UserName+chr(13));
Wait(257);
SendKeys(PassWord);
Wait(650);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y,15,15,15,10,10);
ClickMouse(x,y, True);
HoldMouse(x,y, True);
Wait(8); //Realistic Human Mouse Click
ReleaseMouse(x,y, True); //Kinda like antiBan =)
Wait(3458);
End;

{--------------------------------------------------------]
[The Script Will Hide itself to make it look like it’s a ]
[Human or a GHOST! Oooohhh, Spooky! ]
[--------------------------------------------------------}
Procedure credits;
begin
Writeln(’##########################################################’)
WriteLn(’# Thanks for using Sebos… #’)
WriteLn(’# RuneScape Window Opener! #’)
WriteLn(’#Another thanks to MJordan for the credits =) #’)
WriteLn(’#For the person / People, who made the F1 Thing #’)
WriteLn(’#And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR! #’)
WriteLn(’##########################################################’)

Fixed a few things. You needed a close parentheses and a semi-colon in there.
end;

{-----------------}
{| Main Script |}
{-----------------}
///////////////////
//-DONT TOUCH----//
///////////////////

Begin
GetSelf.Hide;
ActivateClient;
WriteLn(‘Enjoi My script, Thanks.’);
IE_Finder;
BoredMouse;
IE_Tool;
RuneScape;
FindThatGame;
WriteLn(’////////////////’);
WriteLn(’//-GO SEBO!—//’);
WriteLn(’////////////////’);
Credits;
GetSelf.Show;
{—Oh Yeah!—}
End.
[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Ok, I guess I got that Problem Fixed, But Another Question!

You know the thing where you can hide your script?

Like this?

[scar]GetSelf.Hide;[/scar]

Well, I was wondering, And someone told me you can get banned from it , but
I just wanted to make sure…

Can you get banned from hiding SCAR anyways?

Read full topic
